ViewLayer

Class SoundEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewLayer.SoundEngine

  • public class SoundEngine
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for playing sounds and music on request.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip _CarCrashClip
      Clip that plays the sound when two car crashes.
      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip _CarImpactClip
      Clip that plays the sound when a car impacts to a non-car object.
      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip _MotorPowerUpClip
      Clip that plays the sound when a car accelerates.
      private javax.sound.sampled.Clip _MusicClip
      Clip that plays the background music file.

    • Constructor Summary

      SoundEngine()
      Responsible for playing sounds and music on request.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Plays the sound when two cars crashing into each other.

      Plays the sound when a car hits a non-car object.

      Starts or stops the background music.

      Plays or stops playing the sound when a car accelerates.

      Stops the background music.

      • SetBackgroundMusic

        public void SetBackgroundMusic(java.lang.Boolean play)
        Starts or stops the background music.
        Parameters:
        play - True to start the background music. False to stop it.

        public void SetCarAccelerateSound(java.lang.Boolean play)
        Plays or stops playing the sound when a car accelerates.
        Parameters:
        play - True to play the sound when the car is accelerating. False to stop it.
